sentences.sContent: They told him to stay home with his wife instead of going out and carousing with friends.
sentences.sCn: 他们告诉他与他的妻子在一起呆在家里，不要出去和朋友们一起痛饮狂欢。

synos.tran: 喧闹的酒会或宴会；一饮而尽

remMethod.val: car +(r)ouse (唤起) → 在汽车里狂饮欢闹以至于惊动了警察 → 狂饮欢闹

trans.tranOther: to drink a lot, be noisy, and have fun
